name: Fridge Raiders - TOJam 12
description:
2-4 Player Sumo Party game made for TOJam 12.

Playable with Keyboard or Gamepads

Theme: Prepare For Disappointment

Your New Year's Resolution is to lose weight, but you just can't help yourself from raiding the kitchen! Eat food to grow and take control of the kitchen by knocking your friends out of the sumo circle!

Made by: Jake Nissen, Kim Osborne, Stuart Calverley
